Text.Page:
You've really been plugging away at the tuwangis! We really appreciate it, and welcome you to continue to help us. The {@LinkCreature:5#5#Tuwangi Blockheads} and the {@LinkCreature:5#6#Tuwangi Choppers} are next on the list.

Make sure to clear the way and let the others know that it's time to pull it back.

Another step done. I feel really good about having you on our team, . I just want you to know that.

It's still disappointing to know that our relationship with the tuwangis has come down to this.

Haven't gone yet? Are you tired of helping us? Or is it just that you think the tuwangis are too adorable to hurt?

Or perhaps you have a particular hatred of frogs, then?
